articles.content:
THE NEXT fixture block has been delayed until next week as the AFL gives itself more time to assess Brisbane's COVID-19 situation.

articles.title: Up Next Season over for young Sun, knee outs key forward - AFL
articles.description: Connor Budarick will miss the rest of the 2021 season while the news isn't great for Sam Day
articles.content:
GOLD Coast youngster Connor Budarick will miss the rest of the season following confirmation he has ruptured his ACL.

articles.content:
